title: Why no Arcade Event ?
body:
why didnt the Arcade skin get a Event?(considing there so much better then project in my opinoin)
i understand that the Project event just ended but why not wait a month and do a Arcade Event
like im really disappointed that there wasn't 
and if Riot decides to do a Arcade event in the Future, will there reward/Pixel Boarder for previews Arcade Skins
thank you blake
P.S Anyone else got a Arcade event ideas plz share

replies.body:
There is only an event when either a 1820 skin comes out. The project event was to celebrate of some sort the release of Project Ashe like they did with Yi also. And I'm certain they have done an event with arcade skin line when Final boss Veigar or Blitzcrank skin came out with that arcade game.

Saying that i wouldn't mind having a Final Boss level where you join with 5 people and you vs each Evil arcade skin so it feels like a boss battle with them having massive health and damage etc. Would show people the power of team play also

oh didnt know that thx for the info
and yeah a final boss game mode sort of like ascension would be dope as
I think these new arcade skins are rather underwhelming
